text:
e="preserve">Ellie Lust (born 17 September 1966 Amsterdam) is a Dutch television personality. Until 2018, she was a police officer in the rank of inspector and as a spokesperson for the Amsterdam police. She is co-presenter of the annual "Canal Parade" in Amsterdam.
From 1987 to 1989 she attended the police school in Amsterdam. She played volleyball for SV Dynamo and the national team. She was a spokesperson for the program "Crime Watch." She was a co-founder of ‘Pink in Blue’.
